MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:14am. Our engineers have arrived at Greenacres Well substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:27am on 19th November
